mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN count(*) != 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS `count` FROM account a WHERE `대표계좌`= #{mainWithdrawalAccountNumber};
SELECT a.계좌번호 FROM account a WHERE `대표계좌`= #{mainWithdrawalAccountNumber} AND `통화` = #{currencyCode};
SELECT CASE WHEN a.`잔액(원화)` >= #{transferMoney} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS `result` FROM account a WHERE `계좌번호` = #{subAccountNumber};
